original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ▁citta saṃsaṭṭh aṃ ▁kusalaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na citt a saṃsaṭṭh o ▁na kusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ

original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: ▁citta saṃsaṭṭh aṃ ▁akusal aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na citt a saṃsaṭṭh o ▁na akusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ ▁abyākat amūl aṃ ▁tīṇi yeva ▁paccay avasena
